entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.2.1
entry.content:
Hi everyone!üëã I'm excited to announce the latest release for Ticky! This update brings some great new features and important fixes.

What's New üåô Dark Mode: By popular demand, Ticky now officially supports dark mode! You can easily enable or disable it via a toggle in the top-right corner of the app. Your preference will be stored, and it defaults to your system settings. I'd love to hear your feedback on this, so please give it a try and let me know what you think. üé® New Logo: You'll now see the Ticky logo proudly displayed in the top-left corner of the web application. ‚úÖ Sub-task Labels: Sub-tasks now have a label linked directly to their input checkbox, improving accessibility and usability. üê≥ Docker ARM Builds: For our users on ARM-based systems, we've added official Docker ARM builds, making it easier to deploy Ticky.

Bug Fixes and Improvements üí≥ Resolved an error that was occurring with card linking. üìù The issue with incomplete titles in membership dialogs has been fixed. ‚öôÔ∏è I've also made several code improvements under the hood for better performance and stability.

I hope you enjoy these updates! Let me know what you think and if you find any bugs, please open an issue.

What's Changed

  • fix: Card link error by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/5
  • feat: Link label to checkbox for subtasks by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/6
  • feat: Support multi-platform Docker build by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/7
  • fix: Membership dialogs incomplete title by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/8
  • refactor: New way of initializing arrays by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/9
  • feat: Dark mode by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/10

New Contributors

  • @dkorecko made their first contribution in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/5

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.3.0
entry.content:
Hey everyone,

This release contains numerous fixes and smaller features/improvements. Also, it adds the ability to use a custom name for the database and the username. More can be seen in the docker-compose example in the README. This is not a breaking change as it's backwards compatible.

What's Changed

  • refactor: Get rid of delete dialogs code duplication by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/15
  • feature: Automatically release unstable tag by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/16
  • feat: Clicking on logo redirect to home by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/17
  • feat: Added notification for when user settings are updated by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/18
  • fix: User settings not loading checkbox values upon opening by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/19
  • feat: Added possibility of having custom DB name and username by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/20
  • fix: Card would disappear visually when moved to another column and back with no dropping by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/21
  • fix: Checkbox in light mode kept dark mode style by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/22
  • style: Improve checkbox design by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/23
  • fix: Edge case crash when no image/file folder is present by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/24

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.2.1...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.4.0
entry.content:
Hey everyone,

This release adds the ability to snooze cards (and unsnooze them in the board settings), fixes for the color schemes, improved the way deadlines and reminders are displayed, added ability to set that on each card you create you will be auto-assigned and fixes other issues.

What's Changed

  • feat: Snooze cards by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/27
  • fix: Color scheme incorrectly set by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/28
  • fix: Improved time display for deadlines, reminders and snoozing by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/29
  • fix: Deadline wrong color by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/30
  • refactor: Remove At from Activities as not needed by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/31
  • feat: Option to self-assign automatically by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/32
  • fix: Invalid password after creating user by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/33
  • feat: Navigate home after changing new credentials by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/34
  • fix: Added auth checks everywhere they were missing by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/35

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Ticky: v1.6.0
entry.content:
Hey everyone,

This release focuses mostly on bug fixes, code enhancements and general improvements (mostly due to mobile version). Due to this, I have added general board settings with the first ability to disable sortable animations, as they can potentially cause a slight bit of lag when there are many items in the column that's being adjusted.

Let me know if there any issues!

What's Changed

  • fix: Card creation focus would not work when page was navigated to again by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/47
  • fix: Downloading attachments not working by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/48
  • fix: Searching and selecting card from the board it's on would not open the card by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/49
  • refactor: Improved and shortened references, unified names by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/50
  • fix: Display proper members on board cards under "Uncategorized boards" by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/51
  • feat: Add font variants for greek, cyrillic, vietnamese, devanagari and extended variants for all (including latin) by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/52
  • fix: Numerous fixes and improvements to mobile version by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/53
  • feat: Add board general settings tab and option to disable sort animations for performance by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/54
  • fix: Spinner colors in both themes by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/55
  • refactor: Unify names Task to Card everywhere by @dkorecko in https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/pull/56

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dkorecko/Ticky/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0
